We‚Äôre busy at Work System and are looking for another skilled team member to help us keep the power flowing ‚Äì literally!

Who are you?
You‚Äôre the type who‚Äôs great with wiring and loves creating solutions that work. Maybe you have a background as a mechanic or auto electrician ‚Äì or you‚Äôre just naturally handy. Your main tasks will involve electrical work in vans, such as cable routing, connecting LED lights, batteries, cameras, and more. Additionally, you‚Äôll have the chance to visit customers and install shelving systems.

What do we offer?
We don‚Äôt just offer a job ‚Äì we offer a spot on a strong team where quality, teamwork, and good vibes go hand in hand. Here‚Äôs what you get:

  • Competitive salary based on qualifications
  • Pension and health insurance
  • Full-time position with exciting challenges

We‚Äôre looking for someone who:
‚úÖ Has experience with electrical installations
‚úÖ Enjoys working with others and brings a positive attitude to work
‚úÖ Has a driver‚Äôs license and is ready to roll up their sleeves

We hope to find our new colleague as soon as possible, so don‚Äôt wait ‚Äì send us your application and CV today. Or share this post if you know someone who‚Äôd be a perfect fit!

Learn more about us at www.worksystem.dk or call us at 66101199 if you have any questions.

We can‚Äôt wait to hear from you! üööüí°
